title: The Quality of Her Voice
description: In the late 80's a photographer regularly travels from Paris to London to visit friends. One day she hears the voice of a musician on the radio. This moment in time changes her life. Later on in a museum, she accidentally meets the rather unapproachable musician.This is the story of two women and their different lives, and how the world can affect people so differently.
author: J.E.J. Fern
